org.glassfish.admin.rest.adapter

Interface RestResourceProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRestResourceProvider, RestCommandResourceProvider, RestManagementResourceProvider, RestMonitoringResourceProvider

    public interface RestResourceProvider
    Represents contract between RestAdapter and actual ReST resource providers.
    Author:
    sanjeeb.sahoo@oracle.com
